I2C_Transaction_t Struct Reference

Detailed Description

I2C transaction.

This structure defines the nature of the I2C transaction. This structure specifies the buffer and buffer's size that is to be written to or read from the I2C slave peripheral.

Field Documentation

void* I2C_Transaction_t::readBuf

Buffer to which data is to be read into

size_t I2C_Transaction_t::readCount

Number of bytes to be read from the slave

uint32_t I2C_Transaction_t::slaveAddress

Address of the I2C slave device

void* I2C_Transaction_t::writeBuf

Buffer containing data to be written

size_t I2C_Transaction_t::writeCount

Number of bytes to be written to the slave
